issues.description: The solutionâ€™s fix_vec_sub.asm declares the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm as 'extern', whereas the template declares it as 'global'. This mismatch means the function is not exported correctly in the solution, leading to unresolved symbol/linking errors.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm change 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' to 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' so the symbol is correctly exported.
